model_information.name: gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct-0914
model_information.description: An advanced instruction-following model that combines the efficiency of GPT-3.5 Turbo with enhanced chat optimization for precise and concise instruction execution.

specifications.capabilities: Designed for giving specific instructions efficiently, excelling in directly answering questions and completing text tasks swiftly. It is optimized for scenarios that demand accuracy and clarity, providing precise responses.
specifications.limitations: While it is highly efficient in instruction-based tasks, its conversational abilities are more focused and less broad compared to other models not specifically optimized for instructions.
specifications.pricing: Text input $0.0015 / 1K tokens Text output - $0.0020 / 1K tokens.

performance_metrics.efficiency: Maintains the same performance level as other GPT-3.5 models within a 4K context window, designed to be cost-effective.
performance_metrics.focus: Provides more task-oriented and less conversational outputs compared to its predecessors, aiming for direct and efficient instruction following.

ethical_considerations.bias: As with all AI models, there is a potential for reproducing biases present in the training data.
ethical_considerations.use_cases: Suited for applications requiring precise instruction following, such as customer support, content generation, data analysis, educational tools, and more.

example_request.prompt: Explain the significance of quantum computing in cryptography.

versioning_and_updates.update_policy: Updates and improvements are continuously made based on user feedback and advancements in AI research.
versioning_and_updates.changelog: Introduced as an enhancement over previous instruction models with a focus on efficiency and precision in instruction execution.

support_and_community.documentation: For more detailed information, visit OpenAI's official documentation.
support_and_community.community: Engage with other developers and users on the OpenAI Community Forum for discussions and support.
